channel.title: Long looping delay distortion
channel.description: Hei, I'm making a looper based on endless feedback delay objects. It's progressing very well (hope to show it soon) The only problem is that the loops distort slowly (audible after about 1 minute). (It sounds like a mix between overdrive and sr reduction :confused:) In some way it sounds very nice and gives a lot of character to the machine!! But can anybody explain (and fix) this. , H.

item.title: Long looping delay distortion
item.dc:creator: @Gaznesh gareth whittock
item.description:
@Gaznesh wrote:

I'm getting this too. It seems to be on all my delays after a while of feeding back.

Read full topic

item.title: Long looping delay distortion
item.dc:creator: @hnzz
item.description:
@hnzz wrote:

Hei,
I'm making a looper based on endless feedback delay objects.
It's progressing very well (hope to show it soon)
The only problem is that the loops distort slowly (audible after about 1 minute).
(It sounds like a mix between overdrive and sr reduction )
In some way it sounds very nice and gives a lot of character to the machine!!
But can anybody explain (and fix) this.
, H.

Read full topic
